imdb.plot outline: Original biography series features & showcases Christian and Gospel artists or groups such as Kirk Franklin, Al Green, Dr. Bobby Jones, Byron Cage, MercyMe, Third Day, Michael W. Smith, Walter Hawkins, Steven Curtis Chapman and TobyMac sharing stories of the perks and perils of success and how they balance it all while keeping the faith, seen during Midnight Gospel Hour.
imdb.title: Gospel Music Channel: Faith & Fame
akas: Gospel Music Channel: Faith & Fame (United States)
